revision.text: Shiny Pok√©mon can be obtained in a number of different ways, each with their own odds. As of version 0.9.3, the only ways to augment the chances of encountering shinies are to equip the [[Shiny Charm]], using the [[Azure Flute]], or growing [[Starf]] Berries in the [[Farm]] (at full ripeness, each Starf plant gives a 1.015% boost).
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
